```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(tidyverse)
library(RMySQL)
```

```{r}
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
tbl_1 <- db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT DISTINCT title, production_year FROM aka_title
join imdb.keyword on keyword.phonetic_code = aka_title.phonetic_code
where keyword.phonetic_code = 'W6536' or keyword.phonetic_code = 'C5363' or keyword.phonetic_code")
```

```{r}
tbl_1 %>%
  filter(production_year > 1900) %>%
  group_by(production_year) %>%
  summarize("num_movies" = n())  %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = production_year, y = num_movies)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth()
  
```
